text: I'm Sam. I'm a senior technical designer

content team and I'm here today to talk

we're kicking this off, what is Project

put, an effort to build an open world
mobile friendly sample game in, as my
slide says, possibly the most difficult
way possible. say that because it was
also an art jam. We threw an art station
where we had thousands of participants
come in. The idea was for us to build a

beautiful things, package it up as a

which sounds great in practice, totally
easy, but reality was relatively
complicated. So, I'm going to talk you
through the process of creating it,
running the art jam, finishing it, and
releasing it. and then what we're going
to do next. Because even if you're not
doing something quite as over the top as
what we did, it's still useful lessons
for building open world games with large

we added zip lines, all kinds of fun

and networking friendly. So if you were
